name: T - Luna Kate
_source: speak;Kate; Luna! Quick, get behind me!
speak;Luna; I don't need to run and hide, sis.{w} I've got a pegasus! And a weapon!
speak;Kate; There's demons and monsters everywhere.{w} I need you to stay behind me, just in case.
speak;Luna; How about instead of hiding behind you, I have your back?
speak;Kate; As long as you're out of harm's way.
speak;Luna; I'm glad you're so good at listening to me{tgm}...
